title: The Violin maker of Cremona
brief_description: A warm tale of love, desire and selflessness when a young violin maker forgoes winning the hand of Giannina and allows the young apprentice who Giannina loves, to win the violin competition and marry Giannina. Cast includes Herbert Prior, Mary Pickford, Owen Moore, David Miles, Harry Solter, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
